p: Silkworms rearing until the fourth molt stage was performed on antibiotic-containing artificial diet Silkmate 2S (Nihon Nosan Corp., Japan) as previously described [ 27]. The fifth instar larvae were fed on an antibiotic-free artificial diet (Sysmex, Japan) overnight and injected with 50 µl of bacterial strains into the hemolymph (n = 5). The silkworms were kept at 27°C incubator, and survival was recorded.
